policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: Manage Response Headers"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Allow-Origin"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${Origin}"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Allow-Methods"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="*"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Allow-Headers"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${Headers}"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Expose-Headers"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${Headers}"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Allow-Credentials"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="${Credentials}"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="Access-Control-Max-Age"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="86400"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
            <L7p:AddHeader>
                <L7p:HeaderName stringValue="content-type"/>
                <L7p:HeaderValue stringValue="application/json"/>
                <L7p:Target target="RESPONSE"/>
            </L7p:AddHeader>
        </wsp:All>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
